key.name: airport
key.description: The ICAO code of the airport to fetch METAR data for (e.g., EDMA, EDDF, EDDM)

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to fetch new METAR data, in seconds

key.name: vfr-visibility
key.description: Minimum visibility in statute miles for VFR conditions (greater than this value)

key.name: vfr-ceiling
key.description: Minimum ceiling in feet AGL for VFR conditions (greater than this value)

key.name: mvfr-visibility
key.description: Minimum visibility in statute miles for MVFR conditions (this value to VFR threshold)

key.name: mvfr-ceiling
key.description: Minimum ceiling in feet AGL for MVFR conditions (this value to VFR threshold)

key.name: ifr-visibility
key.description: Minimum visibility in statute miles for IFR conditions (this value to MVFR threshold)

key.name: ifr-ceiling
key.description: Minimum ceiling in feet AGL for IFR conditions (this value to MVFR threshold)
